title: WTB: T206 Backs, don't care about player
author: gorrister

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Backs, don't care about player
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to buy the following T206 backs - I don't care about the player nor too much about the condition.  Creasing is OK but I'd prefer no paper loss.

American Beauty 460
Broad Leaf 350 & 460
Carolina brights
Cycle
Drum
Hindu
Lenox
Old Mill Southern Leaguers
Piedmont 460 Fact 25 & 42
Sovereign 150
Sweet Caporal 150 Fact 25, 30 & 649, 460 Fact 42
Uzit
Blank Back (probably out of my price range at this time)

If you have any of these that are in "loved" condition, please send me a scan and price.

Thanks,

Steve

I have most of these for sale with all backs in great shape.  [url]Bliztu@yahoo.com[/url]

Jared
